lines.text: OK, Go Down, you got it; but believe me, whoever got you is goin' ta get got too; and that's a promise.
We'll do what we fuckin like. We're not going to hang round getting knocked off one by one while you smartarse bastards do your investigation routine.
Yeah, I like the old Gravediggers. I'd be glad to see them any time.
[the Gravediggers burst into Stone's apartment and beat him to a pulp]
